title: Hathr AI: HIPAA Compliant AI Chat Tool
description:
HIPAA-Compliant AI for Healthcare:
Hathr.AI delivers secure, private AI tools built for healthcare. Safely use HIPAA-compliant large language models (LLMs) to streamline workflows, manage protected health information, and gain actionable insights. Integrate our solutions via API or use out-of-the-box AI chat tools for document summaries, medical records, and more. Powered by Claude AI, hosted in AWS GovCloud, and tailored to meet healthcare privacy and security standards.
